entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
@WhiteHouse @SecretaryCarson Coronavirus Covid-19 Facts:

Trump hasn't protected the White House!
Trump hasn't protected our grandparents!
Donald Trump won't protect you!
Republicans know Trump is wrong.
It's time they hold Trump accountable. 
Sad. #Kakistocracy #MAGA #coronavirus 
#VoteBlueNoMatterWho
